> Hydras:
>   
>  "What if we got some help of... Her old  bodyguard???" said
> enigmatly Hydras and later of that he typed some buttons in  his com
> link and said "Perceptor... I want a special project from you... 
> Something like I did once with Optimus Prime, this is the bot... Work
> quickly...  we're running our plan"
>   
>  "Yes master Hydras" said trought the com link  Perceptor
>   
>  "Our objetive is lead Rodimus here and his wife to  Blackfortress
> once she's captured"said the male"and in that way that noone  notice
> it or knows who did it" said the Male
> 
> ::Lord Jhiaxus::
> 
> Jhiaxus: Hydras, are you thinking about using a haloimage puppet like
> Megatron.. err, you once used in the likeness of Optimus Prime? You
> tried to have the puppet lead the Earth bound Autobots into some
> distructive crystals, correct? I enjoy history.

Myrmidon just nodded as Jhiaxus and Hydras spoke, keeping his silence
for the moment. Purple optics glowed thoughtfully from the darkness
beneath his lion helm as he regarded the two predacons before him.
Silently Myrmidon wondered just how powerful this Rodimus must be to
command such attention and what fool would actually leave his fortress
undefended to chase a female so foolish as to be caught as they were
planning to do. 

Myrmidon shook his head as his thoughts took a different turn. "I will
go and observe this Atlantis. Then we can  determine what this
disturbance is and its signifigance." Myrmidon glanced at the Atlantis
image to get his bearing and then turned to go.

Preston
(Myrmidon)
